name: OneBigWarmth
description:
Bring your only light source to the exit.

WADS/Arrow Keys to move

Mouse to Look

Left Mouse/ E to interact with the torch holders. Aim at the blocky bit the hit box is a bit finnicky due to...complications

I promise I had grand plans for much more than 2 puzzles but right now I'm just glad there's an exit. Also the part of the project page that talks about pricing is a bit weird right now due to the site being under heavy load I imagine, I'll fix it if it does anything odd.
